# Plaza Paver Replacement Project (PW-22-01003664)

## Project Overview

The Canadian Museum of Nature is issuing a Request For Proposal (RFP) for the replacement of pre-cast concrete pavers on the Plaza in poor to critical conditions. The replacement pavers will be granite. The goal is to ensure safe access to the Plaza.

## Tender Details

- **Tender Reference Number:** PW-22-01003664
- **Solicitation Number:** 22-033-RFP
- **Publication Date:** August 8, 2022
- **Tender Closing Date and Time:** August 30, 2022, 16:00:00
- **Contact Entity:**

	+ Address:  P.O. Box 3443, Station D, Ottawa, ON, Canada K1P 6P4

	+ Email: [Approvisionnement-Procurement@nature.ca](mailto:Approvisionnement-Procurement@nature.ca)

## Bid Submission Instructions

Submissions must be made online via Bonfire at the following website: https://cmn-mcn.bonfirehub.com. All bidders must first register on the Bonfire website and create an online profile. Registration is free of charge. No hard copies will be accepted.

## Tender Description

The successful bidder will provide materials and installation services to remove pre-cast concrete pavers identified as being in poor or critical condition and replace them with granite pavers to ensure safe access to the Plaza. The documents on Bonfire are the official source of information on all bids for the Canadian Museum of Nature. Any vendor who relies on documents obtained from sources other than the Bonfire website does so at their own risk.
